key_talking_points: Sam Bennett (FLA) scores, assisted by Anton Lundell (FLA) and Brandon Montour (FLA), putting Florida ahead 5-4 early in the first.
Mattias Janmark (EDM) with a huge hit on Dmitry Kulikov (FLA) in the offensive zone. Edmonton trying to generate momentum after conceding a goal.
for_commentary_agent.context: A goal and a hit occurred within the last minute, with Florida leading by one. The game is close and action-packed.

game_context.game_situation: FLA leading by 1 in the 1st period

high_intensity_events.summary: Goal scored by Sam Bennett (FLA) at 02:07 of the first period.
Big hit by Mattias Janmark (EDM) on Dmitry Kulikov (FLA) at 02:14 in the offensive zone.

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on the immediate response from Edmonton after giving up the goal. Highlight the physical play and any developing scoring chances.
